item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Just because someone won the signature of the week doesn’t mean you guys should flip some shit over it. It’s honestly not that big of a deal, I’m going to have this badge for what, a week? “You’re only not bitching because you won, Uncalled!” Completely false, I only entered the contest because I had nothing better to do at the time. I didn’t join the second week’s contest either, I could care less for the badge. I’m honestly quite shocked I won, I didn’t put much effort into the signature, took me a mere hour to create.

I mean, look at the focal point, the misplaced blurs, the bland background, etc. I didn’t expect to win.

Read full topic

@Frell wrote:

it wasn’t just me either, CJ liked Uncalled and I was on the fence so we went with Uncalled. As I say again.

Good write up s1gma.

Ill probably choose a team of judges for the next SOTW because I don’t make sigs and I generally don’t like them, so im not in any position to judge them.

Read full topic

item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

Uncalled’s is too flatly coloured for my liking (duller reds + pinks + purples) with little wow, lacks depth and the botched text + the actual size of the thing is detrimental to my opinion of it. if the focal of the piece was meant to be the character then i wouldn’t know as i’m far too distracted by the obstructive and obnoxious fractal and the middle is just far too noisy in contrast to the overly calm + bland background. the smudging is nice behind but certain parts are too badly blurred whereas other parts are perhaps a little overly sharpened.

asshole_rule’s has nice complementary colours but the render is too blended in giving me the choice of too many focal points; my eyes seem to dart around everywhere because of the dual light sources and the left hand side’s yellowy bits. perhaps it’s just part of the effect but i’m not keen on the brightness on one side compared to the dullness of the other. also that little light-ray going up the guy’s arm just doesn’t seem like it should be there. depth is ok.

Rash’s was my vote because despite the colours being generally dark, the colours go extremely well with each other and the focal point is extremely clear to due to the enhancing of the colours (albeit the right-hand side is perhaps also a little overly enhanced and seems to much like part of the render). i love how the claw is sharpened, it steals the eye but not from the character. the lighting is well done and the depth is great in all respects, although the white light bit on the left seems unnecessary and a bit superfluous due to the colouring of it. also the random blue light above the render could do with a bit of removing as it seems misplaced. perhaps it could be lightened up just a notch too.

finally, why the fuck did kronixz_ even get a vote that is just … no…

Read full topic

item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:45, topic:444706”]this is why badges aren’t awarded often
people flip shit over a badge that’s gone in a week[/quote]
Correct.

[quote=“Rash, post:43, topic:444706”]What a joke.

woooo who gives a shit I made the rules. There was a tie so I decided to also count the next one.

It was between asshole and uncalled, and CJ picked uncalled so I went with uncalled also.

That’s just sad.
You want a section to grow, but you enforce the stupidest of rules.

Whatever, Assholes entry was the best. Mine was second best.
Anybody with mediocre graphical ability would be able to tell you that. I don’t even care if you think I sound like a tool.[/quote]
Uncalleds was more well rounded than both of yours, almost like the middle ground. Assholes was a bit too busy and the lights threw it off balance, yours was just a dark mass really.

I enforce stupid rules? Really? Then lets do normal SOTW, where we have one person picking the winner, no voting, no nothing. Is that less biased?

It was seriously 19 13 13 12, there was no reason not to include Uncalleds. Im thinking you guys are thinking I liked Uncalleds so I made up some phony exception just so he would win, thats not what happened. I was looking at the results to pm to cj and I said “what the hell ill throw Uncalleds in there also.”

Rash:

Anybody with mediocre graphical ability would be able to tell you that. I don’t even care if you think I sound like a tool.

Frell:

Ive never made a sig in my life because its the slum life of the graphics community

Maybe if there was something more useful to them other than forums theyd be easier to gauge.

Read full topic

item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

woooo who gives a shit I made the rules. There was a tie so I decided to also count the next one.

It was between asshole and uncalled, and CJ picked uncalled so I went with uncalled also.

the elve age:

I do agree with you Frell, but the point of THIS alone competition was community vote, you can’t just change the rules, you get angry noobs that way.

I didn’t change it on vote day. I changed it 2-3 days into voting.

There was seriously a one point difference that put uncalled behind. Owell big woop we liked his the most AOOEHEE OH NOE WHATEVER suck it up. Find a career where sigs are actually used and ill respect them more in the long run.

THIS IS WHY WE CANT HAVE NICE THINGS

But also go back to krack’s post, these were all so different. SOTW 2 is looking alot more promising because of the render.

item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:16, topic:444706”]This is how voting is going to work:

The community will vote for their favorite until voting as closed.

Once voting has closed the top 3 winners will then be judged by me, Silent CJ, and someone else yet to be chosen to break any ties. The winner of the judges votes wins.[/quote]

[quote=“Frell, post:28, topic:444706”]The top 4 (excluding the tie) were voted again by me and silent cj

Mostly because the tie was not present when I pmed cj lol

And I realized it was turning into a popularity contest. Telling everyone and all your friends to vote for you vs voting on quality.[/quote]
didn’t know mods could change the rules

Read full topic

item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Ive never made a sig in my life because its the slum life of the graphics community lol

You Uncalled and A_R would be the judges, and then it isn’t really a competition because we wouldn’t have enough people fighting on the same level.

Krackkid:

Its hard to judge when everyone’s is so different though.

This^^

The new competition is much better because you can really see who complimented/insulted the render. So hopefully having a new render every time will cut out the people trying to submit old stuff and also make choosing a winner easier.

And this is why there will be a few months wait before SOTW comes. Hopefully the section will be more active by then and we can have a real competition

Read full topic

item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:31, topic:444706”]I didn’t pick it alone. CJ has tons of graphics experience and I asked him which one he liked, and he said uncalled. And I was thinking the same thing.

So overall yes…?

This was a compromise. Taharok messaged me not 30 minutes after voting began and he suggested I pick judges because public voting isn’t going to work very well on a forum like moparscape. But I don’t want to pick it completely alone. So the community nominates the top 3-4 vote values (includes ties) and then I pm around to users who I’ve noticed have a good grasp on graphics and ask them.

asshole_rule would be the runner up, and then Rash. Uncalleds felt more balanced while asshole’s was a bit ‘off’ with those bright lights but still really cool.[/quote]

Really confuses me.

Uncalled compo is really off, his has relatively no depth. His focal is too hidden amongst all of those effect. The smudging in the bg has really a major negative effect, and brings the quality of the piece down. Lighting is non-existant.

That’s just a quick glance.

No offence to anyone, especially you or cj.
But to really judge tags, you have to make them.

Read full topic

item.title: SOTW #1 Voting
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I didn’t pick it alone. CJ has tons of graphics experience and I asked him which one he liked, and he said uncalled. And I was thinking the same thing.

So overall yes…?

This was a compromise. Taharok messaged me not 30 minutes after voting began and he suggested I pick judges because public voting isn’t going to work very well on a forum like moparscape. But I don’t want to pick it completely alone. So the community nominates the top 3-4 vote values (includes ties) and then I pm around to users who I’ve noticed have a good grasp on graphics and ask them.

asshole_rule would be the runner up, and then Rash. Uncalleds felt more balanced while asshole’s was a bit ‘off’ with those bright lights but still really cool.

Read full topic
